definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: Therefore vastness of the sea to its Haozhuang spacious park.
sentences.chinese: 因此浩瀚的大海給予了它豪壯寬闊的樂園。

sentences.english: He leads an army so massive it shakes the ground with its march.
sentences.chinese: 他率領的部隊是如此豪壯，所到之處地動山搖。

definition: lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
to be neither too familiar nor too distant/to keep sb at arm's length
